name: part_006
file: tmp_【#常闇トワ3周年記念LIVE】MIX2 - 私の居場所 - 【3DLIVE】 [knb_mosTUvo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_006.mov

scenes.description: Tokoyami Towa and Nekomata Okayu perform the song 'Lazyroop'.
A transition video introducing the next guest, Nakiri Ayame from Hololive 2nd Generation.
Tokoyami Towa and Nakiri Ayame perform the song 'Yoi no Yo, Yoi!' and share a brief celebratory moment at the end.
scenes.song_name: Yoi no Yo, Yoi! (宵の余、良い！)

subtitles.original: 喜怒哀楽　感情の裏の裏に
subtitles.english: Joy, anger, pathos, and humor... Deep behind my emotions,

subtitles.original: 見え隠れしてた私の合図
subtitles.english: my signals were appearing and disappearing.

subtitles.original: 君に届いているのかな
subtitles.english: I wonder if they're reaching you.

subtitles.original: ああ　春の木陰だって
subtitles.english: Ah, even in the shade of spring trees,

subtitles.original: ああ　夏の日差しだって
subtitles.english: ah, even in the summer sunlight,

subtitles.original: ああ　冬の刹那だって
subtitles.english: ah, even in the winter's fleeting moments...

subtitles.original: 秋が来なければ
subtitles.english: If autumn doesn't come...

subtitles.original: ループループする毎日が　彩りに溢れてくよ
subtitles.english: The loop-looping days are overflowing with color.

subtitles.original: きっと　さんざめく花火の側に　香る夢のように
subtitles.english: Surely, like a dream scented by the bustling fireworks.

subtitles.original: こんなループループする毎日が
subtitles.english: These loop-looping days...

subtitles.original: かけがえない宝石のように
subtitles.english: ...like irreplaceable jewels.

subtitles.original: いつか大切に思えるのなら
subtitles.english: If I can think of them as precious someday,

subtitles.original: 週末の夜も　きらめいて
subtitles.english: even the weekend nights will sparkle.

subtitles.original: 憂鬱な夜も　愛しいね
subtitles.english: Even the melancholy nights are lovely.

subtitles.original: NEXT GUEST
subtitles.english: NEXT GUEST

subtitles.original: HOLOLIVE 2ND GENERATION
subtitles.english: HOLOLIVE 2ND GENERATION

subtitles.original: NAKIRI AYAME
subtitles.english: NAKIRI AYAME

subtitles.original: いよーっ　ぽぽぽぽぽ
subtitles.english: Yo! Popopopopo!

subtitles.original: 宵の余、良い！
subtitles.english: The night's remainder is good!

subtitles.original: 百鬼夜行　あんたわちゃちゃ
subtitles.english: Hyakkiyagou (Night Parade)... You're all bustling about.

subtitles.original: 今夜は眠れない
subtitles.english: I can't sleep tonight.

subtitles.original: 連日連夜　遊びつくさん
subtitles.english: Day and night, let's play to our hearts' content.

subtitles.original: 漫才　一打　打　打　打　打
subtitles.english: Comedy performance, one hit, hit, hit, hit, hit.

subtitles.original: 支離滅裂　溢れてくる
subtitles.english: Incoherent thoughts come overflowing.

subtitles.original: くすぐる好奇心
subtitles.english: Tickling my curiosity.

subtitles.original: 優柔不断　これで決めよう
subtitles.english: Indecisive? Let's decide with this.

subtitles.original: じゃんけんぽん　あいこでしょ
subtitles.english: Rock-paper-scissors! It's a tie!

subtitles.original: パッとパッと開いた
subtitles.english: Pop, pop, it opened up!

subtitles.original: 良い？　良い？　良い？
subtitles.english: Good? Good? Good?

subtitles.original: アッとおっと匂わせる
subtitles.english: Surprising and hinting at something,

subtitles.original: 花火を打ち上げよう
subtitles.english: let's set off some fireworks!

subtitles.original: 歌え　それ見よ　舞え　いけよ
subtitles.english: Sing! Look at that! Dance! Go for it!

subtitles.original: 宵宵怪奇の宴
subtitles.english: A night of strange and wondrous banquets.

subtitles.original: 騒げ　よろず集え　嘉例な鬼は外
subtitles.english: Make some noise! Gather round! Good demons, stay out!

subtitles.original: 歌え　それ舞え　ならえばおんぼろ
subtitles.english: Sing! Dance! If we line up, we're all worn out,

subtitles.original: それすら愛嬌
subtitles.english: but even that is charming.

subtitles.original: 騒げ　暁まで　嘉例な鬼は外
subtitles.english: Make some noise until dawn! Good demons, stay out!

subtitles.original: 阿　是非も無いことだ
subtitles.english: Ah, it's inevitable.

subtitles.original: 喝采を背な　踊り流せ
subtitles.english: With cheers at our backs, let's dance them away.

subtitles.original: 吽　ずっと不世出　派手に舞って
subtitles.english: Un, always unparalleled, dancing flashily.

subtitles.original: 天真爛漫　宵の余、良い！
subtitles.english: Naively innocent, the night's remainder is good!

subtitles.original: 明鏡止水　目を瞑って
subtitles.english: Clear and serene, close your eyes.

subtitles.original: ひと息入れちゃって
subtitles.english: Take a little breath.

subtitles.original: 美味味　味わったら
subtitles.english: Once you've tasted the deliciousness,

subtitles.original: 感無量　打　打　打　打　打
subtitles.english: deeply moved, hit, hit, hit, hit, hit.

subtitles.original: 永劫回帰　終わりたくない
subtitles.english: Eternal recurrence, I don't want it to end.

subtitles.original: 何して遊ぼうか
subtitles.english: What shall we play?

subtitles.original: 暗中模索　これで決めよう
subtitles.english: Groping in the dark? Let's decide with this.

subtitles.original: じゃんけんぽん　あいこでしょ
subtitles.english: Rock-paper-scissors! It's a tie!

subtitles.original: グッとグッと堪えて
subtitles.english: Firmly, firmly hold it in.

subtitles.original: 良い？　良い？　良い？
subtitles.english: Good? Good? Good?

subtitles.original: ワクとワクを綻ばせ
subtitles.english: Let the excitement burst forth,

subtitles.original: 最高を打ち鳴らそう
subtitles.english: let's ring out the best times!

subtitles.original: 泣いて　笑え　読み続け
subtitles.english: Cry, laugh, and keep on reading...

subtitles.original: きらきらびびか輝け
subtitles.english: ...and shine brilliantly!

subtitles.original: おいで　鼓舞をせぬ　嘉例な鬼は外
subtitles.english: Come on over! Don't be discouraged! Good demons, stay out!

subtitles.original: 泣いて　笑え　舞い進め
subtitles.english: Cry, laugh, and dance forward!

subtitles.original: 東奔西走　何でも良いぞ
subtitles.english: Running all over the place, anything goes!

subtitles.original: おいで　遠慮も無用　嘉例な鬼は外
subtitles.english: Come on over! No need for restraint! Good demons, stay out!

subtitles.original: 阿　惚けちゃいそうな夜を飾る
subtitles.english: Ah, decorating the night that makes me space out.

subtitles.original: 眩しい声に　連れられて
subtitles.english: Led by the dazzling voices,

subtitles.original: 阿　端から端まで最高派手に舞って
subtitles.english: Ah, from end to end, dancing most flashily.

subtitles.original: 天真爛漫　宵の余、良い！
subtitles.english: Naively innocent, the night's remainder is good!

subtitles.original: トワ様3周年おめでとー！
subtitles.english: Towa-sama, happy 3rd anniversary!

subtitles.original: お嬢ありがとう！
subtitles.english: Ojou, thank you!

subtitles.original: よいしょー！
subtitles.english: Yoisho-!
